Content.Text:
<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Tsk tsk. You're late, Flik. As our leader, it falls to
you to be responsibly responsible.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, Torque! I've got a strange gadget I picked
up that you can have later.

<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, I may find it in my heart to overlook this...

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, what did your investigation of this place turn
up?

<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allow me to report. This area is highly suitable
for the cultivation of rice and wheat.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Sounds like some pretty fertile farming ground.
Keep up the good work!

<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I only do good work, of course.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well hey, <MYNAME>. Looks like you found us
again.

<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, so you are <MYNAME>, correct?
<PAGE>
Hrmmm. How intriguing! I would love to study
what allows you to see us.
<PAGE>
I am known as <BLUE>Torque</BLUE>. It is a pleasure to make
your acquaintance.

<FACE_FLAT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, we've learned about what grows best here,
so we ought to be on our way. 'Til we meet
again!

<FACE_TORCU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I had hoped to speak with you at length,
but...perhaps at a later time, yes?

That Nature Sprite seemed very level-headed. I
wonder when I'll see them next...
